spells.html_content:
Spells

Runification
/ Manifestation
0 Range / 2AP

Triggers all of the caster's runes that are occupied by an enemy:
• Inflicts damage on enemies in the rune's element.
• Increases the caster's characteristics based on the rune's element for each enemy hit.
• Applies the rune's elemental state.

Can generate elemental combinations.
Required level: :
1|68|134

Normal effects

Triggers runes

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

2

No

No

Yes

spells.html_content:
Spells

Manifestation
/ Runification
1 - 6 Range / 2AP

Triggers the targeted rune.

If an enemy is on the cell:
• Inflicts damage on enemies in the rune's element.
• Increases the caster's characteristics based on the rune's element.
• Applies the rune's elemental state.

If the cell is or becomes free, summons an Elemental Manifestation, applying the effects of the movement:
• Earth: repels entities from the centre in a 3-cell circle around the Manifestation.
• Fire: switches the positions of the caster and the Manifestation.
• Water: attracts entities towards the centre in a 3-cell circle around the Manifestation.
• Air: teleports entities symmetrically in relation to the Manifestation in a 3-cell circle around it.

The Manifestation is destroyed on the next turn.
When it dies, the Manifestation applies its elemental state in a 3-cell circle around itself.

Can generate elemental combinations.
Required level: :
105|172

Normal effects

Triggers runes
Summons an Elemental Manifestation
Pushes back 3 cell(s)
Switches positions
Attracts 3 cell(s)
Symmetric teleportation

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
2
Modifiable range
Yes
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

details.name: Manifestation
details.description:
Triggers the targeted rune.

If an enemy is on the cell:
• Inflicts damage on enemies in the rune's element.
• Increases the caster's characteristics based on the rune's element.
• Applies the rune's elemental state.

If the cell is or becomes free, summons an Elemental Manifestation, applying the effects of the movement:
• Earth: repels entities from the centre in a 3-cell circle around the Manifestation.
• Fire: switches the positions of the caster and the Manifestation.
• Water: attracts entities towards the centre in a 3-cell circle around the Manifestation.
• Air: teleports entities symmetrically in relation to the Manifestation in a 3-cell circle around it.

The Manifestation is destroyed on the next turn.
When it dies, the Manifestation applies its elemental state in a 3-cell circle around itself.

Can generate elemental combinations.

Places an Air rune, inflicts Fire and Air damage, and applies the Fire and Air states.

Can generate elemental combinations.

other.title: Number of casts per turn per target
Cast in a straight line only

spells.html_content:
Spells

Morph
/ Elemental Drain
1 - 4 Range / 3AP

Inflicts damage in the targeted enemy's elemental state.

Spell casting constraints are modified based on the elemental state:
• Water: reduces the spell's AP cost.
• Earth: disables the spell's line of sight.
• Air: increases the spell's maximum range.
• Fire: increases the spell's damage.
Each effect can be stacked one time.

Changes the elemental state based on the current state:
• Water -> Earth -> Air -> Fire -> Water.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
120|187

Normal effects

24 to 27 (Water damage)
24 to 27 (Earth damage)
24 to 27 (Air damage)
24 to 27 (Fire damage)
Reduces the Morph spell's AP cost by 1 (3 turns)
Morph no longer requires a line of sight (3 turns)
Increases the Morph spell's maximum range by 4 (3 turns)
Increases Morph's basic damage by 10 (3 turns)

Critical effects

29 to 33 (Water damage)
29 to 33 (Earth damage)
29 to 33 (Air damage)
29 to 33 (Fire damage)
Reduces the Morph spell's AP cost by 1 (3 turns)
Morph no longer requires a line of sight (3 turns)
Increases the Morph spell's maximum range by 4 (3 turns)
Increases Morph's basic damage by 10 (3 turns)

Other characteristics

Probability of Critical Hit
15%
Uses per turn
3
Number of casts per turn per target
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

• Fire: removes AP.
• Water: erodes the target.
• Air: removes Range.
Each effect can be stacked one time.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Runic Repulsion
/ Journey
0 Range / 1AP

Repels targets in an area of effect and repels them again for each of the caster's runes.
The pushback for each rune consumed is reduced.

Consumes all of the caster's runes.
Required level: :
150

Normal effects

Pushes back 1 cell(s)
Pushes back 2 cell(s)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
1
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes
Area of Effect

spells.html_content:
Spells

Elemental Guardian
/ Elemental Shield
1 - 6 Range / 3AP

Summons a biddable Elemental Guardian that inflicts Neutral damage or damage in the elemental state of its target.
When the caster generates an elemental combination, the Guardian gains effects based on the combination.

There can only be one Elemental Guardian per team. If the caster's Elemental Guardian is still alive when summoned again, the old one is killed to make room for the new one.
Required level: :
155

Normal effects

Summons Elemental Guardian
Quadramental Elaboration

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Global recast interval
4
Recast interval
4
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

details.name: Elemental Guardian
details.description:
Summons a biddable Elemental Guardian that inflicts Neutral damage or damage in the elemental state of its target. 
When the caster generates an elemental combination, the Guardian gains effects based on the combination.

There can only be one Elemental Guardian per team. If the caster's Elemental Guardian is still alive when summoned again, the old one is killed to make room for the new one.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Elemental Trap
/ Propagation
1 - 6 Range / 2AP

Places a single-cell trap that applies effects on enemies based on their elemental state in a 2-cell circle:
• Earth: reduces the duration of effects.
• Fire: reduces heals received.
• Water: applies the Gravity state.
• Air: applies the Unable to Lock state.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Consumes the elemental states of enemies hit.
Required level: :
180

Normal effects

Places a trap

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Uses per turn
1
Modifiable range
Yes
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

The effects cannot be unbewitched.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Arcane Torrent
/ Tribute
1 - 8 Range / 3AP

Inflicts Air, Earth, Fire and Water damage on enemies in an area of effect.
The spell's damage increases with each elemental combination generated by the caster.
The effects are removed after the spell has been used.

Requires generating at least one elemental combination to be used.
Required level: :
200

Normal effects

3 (Air damage)
3 (Earth damage)
3 (Fire damage)
3 (Water damage)
Increases Arcane Torrent's basic damage by 3 (infinite)

Critical effects

4 (Air damage)
4 (Earth damage)
4 (Fire damage)
4 (Water damage)
Increases Arcane Torrent's basic damage by 3 (infinite)

Other characteristics

Probability of Critical Hit
5%
Global recast interval
3
Recast interval
3
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
Yes
Target necessary
Yes
Area of Effect
Circle of 2 cells
